headline: Can Visa and Akamai Become the Trust Backbone of Agentic Commerce?
summary: V is teaming up with Akamai to secure AI-driven agentic commerce, authenticating shopping agents and intent to separate legitimate activity from fraud.

headline: E-Commerce Today - Akamai and Visa Team Up for Secure AI-Driven Commerce
summary: Akamai Technologies, Inc. and Visa Inc. have announced a strategic collaboration designed to enhance security in the emerging field of agentic commerce. By integrating Visa’s Trusted Agent Protocol with Akamai’s edge-based behavioral intelligence, the partnership aims to provide robust identity and fraud controls necessary for merchants to trust AI agents that shop on behalf of consumers. This development addresses challenges such as authenticating AI agents, identifying the users they...

headline: Akamai Technologies (AKAM) and Visa Deal Highlights AI Security Push – Is the Stock Still Undervalued?
summary: Akamai Technologies (AKAM) just put a fresh spotlight on its stock by teaming up with Visa to secure agentic commerce, blending Visa’s Trusted Agent Protocol with Akamai’s edge based behavioral intelligence and bot protection. See our latest analysis for Akamai Technologies. The Visa collaboration caps a busy stretch that includes the Fermyon acquisition for edge compute, new ISV partnerships, and a recent broker upgrade. Yet Akamai’s share price return is still modest, with longer term total...
